org.sindice.siren.qparser.json.dsl

Class TwigQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sindice.siren.qparser.json.dsl.AbstractQuery
      • org.sindice.siren.qparser.json.dsl.AbstractNodeQuery
        • org.sindice.siren.qparser.json.dsl.TwigQuery

  • public class TwigQuery
extends AbstractNodeQuery
    Class that represents a twig object of the JSON query syntax.

      • with

        public TwigQuery with(AbstractNodeQuery child)
        Adds a child clause with a NodeBooleanClause.Occur#MUST operator.

        Use this method for child clauses that must appear in the matching twigs.

        See Also:
        NodeBooleanClause.Occur#MUST, TwigQuery.addChild(NodeQuery, NodeBooleanClause.Occur)

      • with

      • without

        public TwigQuery without(AbstractNodeQuery child)
        Adds a child clause with a NodeBooleanClause.Occur#MUST_NOT operator.
